notes_text: Medicinal cannabis was legalized on 22 September 2017.
notes: Medicinal cannabis was legalized on 22 September 2017.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Argentina}} Medicinal cannabis was legalized on 22 September 2017.<ref>{{Cite news |url=https://www.infobae.com/politica/2017/09/22/el-gobierno-reglamento-la-ley-de-cannabis-medicinal/ |title=El Gobierno reglament√≥ la ley de cannabis medicinal |date=22 September 2017 |publisher=[[Infobae]] |access-date=4 January 2023 |archive-date=8 June 2021 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20210608073626/https://www.infobae.com/politica/2017/09/22/el-gobierno-reglamento-la-ley-de-cannabis-medicinal/ |url-status=live |language=es}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.argentina.gob.ar/justicia/derechofacil/leysimple/cannabis-medicinal |title=Cannabis medicinal |author=<!--not stated--> |website=Argentina.gob.ar |date=12 July 2019 |publisher=[[Government of Argentina]] |trans-title=Medicinal cannabis |language=es |access-date=2024-01-04 |url-status=live |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20231206063257/https://www.argentina.gob.ar/justicia/derechofacil/leysimple/cannabis-medicinal |archive-date=2023-12-06}}</ref>
